sales-pitch: WHO WANTS TO BE A MILLIONAIRE
colorPopup: Some colors are already taken. Hurry up and pick you favourite!
lobbyfull: Lobby is full please try again laterðŸ˜”
waitingMessage: Waiting for host to start poll
rulesli1: You enter the game with a total of 2 lives
rulesli2: If you get an answer wrong you lose one life
rulesli3: You lose the game when you have lost both lives
rulesli4: Pick an answer and slide down the grid on top to lock your final answer within the time limit
rulesli5: The player with most right answers win, if there are multiple players with most right answers, the one with fastest last answer wins
question: Question
readyMessage: Your quiz is created! Let all participants join before continuing.
choosePollText: Choose the quiz you want to use
heading: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire
readyBeforeQuestion: Get ready for the next question
letParticipantsJoin: Let all participants join before starting the quiz!
instructLi1: Open the 'Show on board' button to show the Poll ID to the players and ask them to join the lobby.
instructLi2: The game will play on the 'show on board page'.
instructLi3: Make sure all participants has joined the lobby before clicking admin button.
instructLi4: After everyone has joined the lobby: Click the admin button to administrate the game.
